techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'I think we're on farmland, and where there is a farm, there is usually a farmer. Let's find his homestead.' - Jesse

techs.name: Study of the Force
techs.quote: 'The Force is what gives a Jedi his power. It's an energy field created by all living things. It surrounds us and penetrates us; it binds the galaxy together.' - Obi-Wan Kenobi

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'We are lowly farmers from a village in the poorer parts of this planet...' - Ramiz

techs.name: Slugthrower
techs.quote: 'Slugthrowers. I hate 'em. But they're easy to maintain. Day or two in the jungle and your blaster'll never fire again. A good slug rifle, keep 'em wiped and oiled, they last forever. The guerrillas have pretty good luck with them, even though they take a lot of practice—slugs are ballistic, y'know? You have to plot the trajectory in your head. Shee, gimme a blaster anytime.' - Phloremirlla Tenk

techs.name: Mining
techs.quote: 'We'll be sent to the spice mines of Kessel, smashed into who-knows-what!' - C-3PO

techs.name: Interstellar flight
techs.quote: 'A starship is a weapon, but it's the rust that makes it deadly.' - An old spacer's line

techs.name: Calendar
techs.quote: 'Time. That's what's left when you strip away everything else. From a certain perspective, time's the only thing a thief ever really steals. And it's the only gift an irredeemable disaster can give to anyone.' - Chelli Lona Aphra

techs.name: Computer
techs.quote: 'It's amazing what computers can do these days.' - Garin

techs.name: Forcesaber
techs.quote: 'It's a Forcesaber, weapons of the Force Hounds of the Rakata.' - Xesh

techs.name: Hunting
techs.quote: 'True hunting is in the eye. Stare at prey. Make the prey cower. Know you can eat it alive. Victory without weapons… but only if you are stronger, yes?' - Jagraan

techs.name: Beam tube
techs.quote: 'Bury the millennial-old debate whether sleeper ships, jump-gates, or a hyperbeacon network supplied the primary means of star travel during Xim's era, or whether beam-tubes, particle dischargers, and pulse-cannons were the actual armaments.' - Professor S. V. Skynx

techs.name: Masonry
techs.quote: 'How happy are those whose walls already rise!' - Virgil
